title: Civilized Cycles Vespa-Modeled eBike has self-leveling suspension, carries passenger
content:
Civilized Cycles have released an eBike modeled on the Vespa moped, complete with a 750W mid-drive motor, self-leveling suspension and space for a passenger! The Model 1 gets expanding panniers for up to four fully laden shopping bags on a Step-Thru frame for easy mounting and dismounting. Here’s everything we know about the $6,000 US […]
